git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: autopep8 wrapper
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Runs autopep8 over python source.  If you configure additional arguments you'll want to at least include -i.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check for added large files
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Prevent giant files from being committed

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check python ast
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Simply check whether the files parse as valid python.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check for byte-order marker
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Forbid files which have a UTF-8 byte-order marker

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check for case conflicts
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Check for files that would conflict in case-insensitive filesystems

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check docstring is first
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Checks a common error of defining a docstring after code.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check JSON
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook checks json files for parseable syntax.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Pretty format JSON
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook sets a standard for formatting JSON files.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check for merge conflicts
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Check for files that contain merge conflict strings.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check for broken symlinks
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Checks for symlinks which do not point to anything.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check Xml
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook checks xml files for parseable syntax.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Check Yaml
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook checks yaml files for parseable syntax.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Debug Statements (Python)
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook checks that debug statements (pdb, ipdb, pudb) are not imported on commit.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Detect AWS Credentials
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Detects *your* aws credentials from the aws cli credentials file

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Detect Private Key
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Detects the presence of private keys

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Fix double quoted strings
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook replaces double quoted strings with single quoted strings

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Fix End of Files
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Ensures that a file is either empty, or ends with one newline.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Fix python encoding pragma
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Add # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- to the top of python files

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Flake8
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook runs flake8.

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Forbid new submodules
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Prevent addition of new git submodules

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Tests should end in _test.py
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This verifies that test files are named correctly

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Pyflakes (DEPRECATED, use flake8)
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook runs pyflakes. (This is deprecated, use flake8).

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Fix requirements.txt
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: Sorts entries in requirements.txt

git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.name: Trim Trailing Whitespace
git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-h.description: This hook trims trailing whitespace.

git://github.com/asottile/reorder_python.name: Reorder python imports
git://github.com/asottile/reorder_python.description: This hook reorders imports in python files.

git://github.com/asottile/cheetah_lint.name: Reorder cheetah imports
git://github.com/asottile/cheetah_lint.description: This hook reorders imports in cheetah files.

git://github.com/asottile/cheetah_lint.name: Cheetah flake
git://github.com/asottile/cheetah_lint.description: Lint cheetah code using flake8 and some other checks.

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Syntax Check (Comprehensive)
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Check PHP Syntax on ALL PHP staged files with user friendly messages and colors

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Syntax Check (Quick)
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Runs php -l on all staged files. Exits when it hits the first errored file

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Unit
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Run the full php unit test. Checks which PHPUnit executable is available first and then runs it. Preference order is vendor/bin, phpunit and phpunit.phar.

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Codesniffer
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Run php codesniffer against all staged files.

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Codesniffer (Code Beutifier and Formatter)
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Run php codesniffer against all staged files.

git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.name: PHP Coding Standards Fixer
git://github.com/hootsuite/pre-commit-ph.description: Run php coding standards fixer against all staged files.

git://github.com/pricematch/pricematch-p.name: Block if "DO NOT COMMIT" is found
Only allowed model method is mass_insert in parsing
Do not forget a comma in a %w() string array
Do not write "Rails.env =" to avoid assignment
Remove the encoding comment at beginning of file
Do not forget describe.only in test files
Start your spec files with the line `include 'rails_helper'`
Do not leave puts statements in production code
Use HypertextTransfer wrapper instead of HTTParty directly

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: CRLF end-lines checker
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Forbid files containing CRLF end-lines to be committed

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: CRLF end-lines remover
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Replace CRLF end-lines by LF ones before committing

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: No-tabs checker
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Forbid files containing tabs to be committed

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: Tabs remover
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Replace tabs by whitespaces before committing

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: Missing CSS classes checker
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Detect unused or missing CSS classes definitions, and abort if any of the later ones is found

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: HTML syntax validator using W3C v.Nu checker
HTML img tag alt text checker
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: List every tag without a alt= or data-ng-attr-alt= attribute

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: Non-standard HTML attributes checker
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Detect any non-standard attribute that is not prefixed with data-

git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.name: safety
git://github.com/Lucas-C/pre-commit-hook.description: Analyze your Python requirements for known security vulnerabilities
